summary: The provider package supplies cloud‑specific implementations (AWS, Azure, GCP) for Checkov’s Terraform image referencer. Each provider parses Terraform resource definitions for its platform, extracts referenced container image URIs, and integrates with the generic image‑referencing framework.
business_intent: Enable automated security and compliance checks by identifying all container images declared in Terraform code across major cloud providers, so they can be scanned for vulnerabilities before deployment.
